divs: Sighting Details I have this feeling to look outside the patio and look up and saw 2 white orbs moving side by side, I call my partner to look up too, he said he didn't see anything, but finally he did and said that they were amazing. He couldn't believe what he was seeing. since i have seen them before just in the same place and always keep looking up having the feeling I am going to see them again. after about 10 minutes they desapeared. When back inside and talk about it. I get the sensation that they want us to see them and get used to them, so when they show themselves, we are not so afraid of them.
Summary: 2 white orbs moving side by side.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Orange
There were no other sightings in Orange on or around April 19th 2010
